quote: So, so pleased with my eyelashes. I asked for the natural look, and that exactly what I got!! The salon is very friendly, made to feel welcome. I'll def be back
name: Lesley E

quote: This is a great place. Iggy is friendly, professional and conscientious. I will be returning when I need more done. I would recommend this establishment to anyone.
name: Carol W

quote: Simply the best! No other technician has managed to get my lashes looking so beautiful and natural. Iggy is a true professional and takes the time to understand what you want.
name: Rebecca T

quote: After years of penciling in my brows, Iggy's microblading has been life-changing! They look so natural and perfectly shaped for my face. Worth every penny.
name: Sophia M

quote: This is my third time coming to Iggy for my brows and she smashes it every time! Her attention to detail is amazing, and immediately makes you feel so comfortable in her salon!
name: Annabel P

quote: The million dollar facial was worth every penny! My skin is glowing days later and Iggy's knowledge about skin care is incredibly impressive.
name: Emma J

quote: I was nervous about getting my lips done but Iggy put me at ease immediately. The result is so subtle and beautiful, exactly what I wanted!
name: Hannah L

quote: First time having a dermaplaning facial and I'm completely converted! My makeup is going on so much better and my skin feels incredible.
name: Olivia S

quote: Iggy is truly an artist. The way she looked at my face and knew exactly what would suit me best was impressive. My brows have never looked better.
name: Catherine D

quote: I am in love with my Ombre brows üòç best choice I ever made booking with Iggy!
name: Irene

quote: Honestly the best beauty treatment I've ever had. The care and precision Iggy puts into her work is evident. I've been receiving compliments non-stop!
name: Victoria M

quote: I had microblading done with Iggy and recently went for waxing near where I live. The lady said she has never seen better job!
name: Amelia
